text: Cleve Loney (November 5, 1950 â€“ August 22, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the Montana House of Representatives from 2011 to 2013. He was born in Great Falls, Montana. Loney died on August 22, 2020, in Great Falls at age 69. He drowned in the Missouri River after his kayak tipped over. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Accidental deaths by drowning in the United States Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Montana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Kayakers
title: Cleve Loney
